segment.source: How to use the Search Providers page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to add additional providers and set the default.
segment.target: How to use the Search Providers page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to add additional providers and set the default.

segment.source: Use the Search Providers page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the Search Providers page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the Search Providers page in the IEAK 11 Wizard
segment.target: Use the Search Providers page in the IEAK 11 Wizard

segment.source: The Search Providers page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you add a default search provider (typically, Bing®) and additional providers to your custom version of IE.
segment.target: The Search Providers page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you add a default search provider (typically, Bing®) and additional providers to your custom version of IE.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: The Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 offers improved and extended search settings.
segment.target: The Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 offers improved and extended search settings.

segment.source: However, you can still optionally include support for Search Suggestions and Favicons, as well as Accelerator previews by using an .ins file from a previous version of IEAK.
segment.target: However, you can still optionally include support for Search Suggestions and Favicons, as well as Accelerator previews by using an .ins file from a previous version of IEAK.

segment.source: To use the Search Providers page
segment.target: To use the Search Providers page

segment.source: Click Import to automatically import your existing search providers from your current version of IE into this list.
segment.target: Click Import to automatically import your existing search providers from your current version of IE into this list.

segment.source: Click Add to add more providers.
segment.target: Click Add to add more providers.

segment.source: The Search Provider box appears.
segment.target: The Search Provider box appears.

segment.source: In the Display Name box, type the text that appears in the Search Options menu for the search provider.
segment.target: In the Display Name box, type the text that appears in the Search Options menu for the search provider.

segment.source: In the URL box, type the full URL to the search provider, including the http:// prefix.
segment.target: In the URL box, type the full URL to the search provider, including the http:// prefix.

segment.source: In the Favicon URL box, type the full URL to any icon to associate with your provider.
segment.target: In the Favicon URL box, type the full URL to any icon to associate with your provider.

segment.source: In the Suggestions URL (XML) box, type the associated search suggestions in XML format.
segment.target: In the Suggestions URL (XML) box, type the associated search suggestions in XML format.

segment.source: In the Suggestions URL (JSON) box, type the associated search suggestions in JavaScript Object Notation format.
segment.target: In the Suggestions URL (JSON) box, type the associated search suggestions in JavaScript Object Notation format.

segment.source: In the Accelerator Preview URL box, type the associated Accelerator preview URL for each provider, if it’s necessary.
segment.target: In the Accelerator Preview URL box, type the associated Accelerator preview URL for each provider, if it’s necessary.

segment.source: Check the Display Search Suggestions for this provider box to turn on search suggestions for the provider, and then click OK.
segment.target: Check the Display Search Suggestions for this provider box to turn on search suggestions for the provider, and then click OK.

segment.source: Check the Search Guide URL Customization box if you’re going to add your search providers to a custom webpage for your employees.
segment.target: Check the Search Guide URL Customization box if you’re going to add your search providers to a custom webpage for your employees.

segment.source: Then, type the URL to the custom webpage in the text box.
segment.target: Then, type the URL to the custom webpage in the text box.

segment.source: Click Edit to change your search provider information, click Set Default to make a search provider the default for your employees, or Remove to delete a search provider.
segment.target: Click Edit to change your search provider information, click Set Default to make a search provider the default for your employees, or Remove to delete a search provider.

segment.source: Click Next to go to the Important URLs - Home Page and Support page or Back to go to the Browser User Interface page.
segment.target: Click Next to go to the Important URLs - Home Page and Support page or Back to go to the Browser User Interface page.
